Name: Conducting Tenure
Description: This compound-value type holds information about the period of time a conductor was associated with an ensemble.

Properties.Name: Conductor
Properties.Description: The person who conducted this group during this period.

Properties.Name: Ensemble
Properties.Description: The group conducted by this person during this period.

Properties.Name: From
Properties.Description: The start of the period during which this person conducted this group.

Properties.Name: To
Properties.Description: The end of the period during which this person conducted this group.
